lines: 3m medical materials 9874 polyethylene double coated tape
this double sided medical tape on a roll (9874) consists of a 3 mil transparent polyethylene film, coated on two sides with an acrylic adhesive
adheres to high surface energy substrates
attach devices to the body or skin and a variety of substrate materials
3m medical tape 9874, double sided transparent polyethylene, 60# liner,configurable
material and / or technology for health care or medical device construction
designed with lower adhesion than #1522 for applications needing less aggressive adhesive
may be integrated with additional 3m technologies and medical materials for finished device innovations
get technical expertise right from the start – making your materials selection process faster, easier and smarter.
the tape is wound with the liner on the outside of the roll to accommodate certain processing and handling conditions.may be used for health care medical devices.
